oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Capt. Archibald D. Norris, Co. K, 7th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA to his father
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Capt. Norris served in Co. K, 7th Tenn. Inf. Regt. from Wilson County, which mustered in before TN seceded and was part of Lee's Army of Northern Virginia. This very long and detailed series of letters describes the movements of Gen. Donelson's Brigade in; the days before Cheat Mountain and Stanton, Virginia. Considerable detail about marches and fighting including a major engagement around Sept. 24, 1861.
